Articles.Content: Hi, i'm just here to contribute on some mods and maybe create my first one

Hello Identitools and welcome to the KSP Forums!

I'm pleased to hear that you are here to contribute.  I hope you get at least as much out of this community as you give.

Happy landings!
Hey there, enjoy your stay here! This place is full of supportive, helpful people, so don't be afraid to ask if you need anything!

Welcome to the forums!

What types of mods do you want to make?
^please ^1.25m ^spaceplane ^cargo ^bay ^i ^really ^need ^that
A small moon orbiting kerbin in a very low orbit in order to mess things up with his SOI. The moon will also have a very special shape you can see in an Austin Powers movie, the... "dr evil ship"
If you make an austin powers mod series, you are kinda screwed because you won't be able to host it on curse or the forums, due to the parts shapes...

Well, i'm kinda screwed for that one, Kopernicus modders says i can't do a shape like this easily or at all. But i can always make ships appear in every new save. Do you know a way to do that? (populate a world when creating it)
Welcome! Always good when a member joins to create new mods!
